full_text: Screened by NARA, 9/27/2023 2RS PINDIA GT GT SMORT TWO RUPEES RUPEES Affidavit. I, Narain Dass Sikri, son of Mr. Ghanshyam Dass Sikri, of The Mall, Karnal, do solemnly affirm that :- (i) I was born in Kot Sultan (District Muzzafargarh- Pakistan) on December 1, 1903. (ii) Mr. Om Parkash Sikri is my real son, (iii) Mr. Om Parkash Sikri was born at Bahawalpur (now in Pakistan) on March 29, 1930, (iv) Mr. om Parkash Sikri was married to Kamla on April 23, 1959, (v) Mr. Om Parkash Sikri and Mr. Atam Parkash Sikri are my real sons and further they are real brothers to each other born of the same parents i.e. myself and Mrs. Sushila Devi Sikri (my wife). KUM C. It is further affirmed that I know the Asking above facts personally as the same have happened AY TESTED before me and in my family. 6.6.7 Correct copy, compared with original Original returned on 11/20/74 Linc continued. Contact Representative U.S. Immigration & Naturalization Service - WAS
